name: GWO - Bright Dawn - Official Project
short_description:
Welcome to GWO - Bright Dawn the official development project hosted on SourceForge, Here we push ourselves to deliver the best of us for players around the globe who seek to see a fully functional, up and running Private Server of GodsWar Online, and the best of all OPEN SOURCE, meaning every single one who would like to cooperate, surely can.

The project shape up, started roughly 4 years ago, While I was still at High School, I couldn't do much on my own, but right now, the project is doing good, we are in a very early phase, since I'm still recruiting, developers to join the main developers team, and people who would like to work hand-by-hand with me.

if you would like to read more about the phases that we are going through check the main website and stay tuned!

Cya!
summary: Offical Project Page for GWO Bright Dawn Development
